verbs.description: [V: Reporting] [ARGM-DIR: from the swamp that Trump absurdly promised to drain] : EPA Administrator Scott Pruitt received a very valuable gift from a coal executive for whom he has rescinded regulations , saving him untold millions , perhaps billions , in the process . The gift : Courtside seats at a Kentucky basketball game . It was one of the biggest games of …
